All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Corpus
 
Corpus.Builder
 
CorpusException
Corpus-related exceptions
CorpusException.EmptyCorpusException
Exception thrown when the corpus is empty
CorpusException.InconsistentWordSizeException
Exception thrown when words in the corpus have inconsistent lengths
CorpusLoader
Utility class for loading word corpora from various sources
Filter
Represents a filter used to match against NGram objects in the Matchle game.
GameLogic
Shared game logic for the Matchle word guessing game.
GameState
Represents the complete state of a Matchle game session.
GameStateManager
Manages the persistence of game state to and from storage.
IndexedCharacter
A record representing a character at a specific position in a sequence.
MatchleException
Top-level exception class for Matchle game, all custom exceptions should extend this class
MatchleGame
The main console implementation of the Matchle word guessing game.
MatchleGUI
A graphical user interface implementation of the Matchle word guessing game.
MatchleUtils
Utility class providing common functions for the Matchle game.
NGram
Represents an immutable sequence of characters with positional information.
NullCharacterException
Exception thrown when a character sequence contains a null character.
ScoringStrategy
Strategy interface for scoring possible guesses in the Matchle game.
UIUtils
Utility class providing common UI operations for the Matchle game interface.
